creator: chealer@gmail.com
text:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/en/rewrite/intro.html#regex links to http://www.oreilly.com/catalog/regex2/index.html which yields a 404.

BTW. I think that linking to a book is overkill.

Short term: Link fixed in trunk, 2.2

Longer term: Will discuss on docs list regarding linking to a book.
creator: rbowen@apache.org

text: The consensus on the docs list is that this book is what we'd call standard literature. It's the accepted best reference on the topic, and so linking to it is the right thing to do, as we simply cannot document in that depth here.
creator: rbowen@apache.org
rbowen@apache.org
text: This was fixed some time ago.
